arts.ttl: Hoffenheim fight back to end RB Leipzig's unbeaten run
arts.sum: With momentum firmly on their side, the hosts completed the turnaround in the 38th minute when Tim Lemperle rose highest to meet Vladimir Coufal's pinpoint cross, heading Hoffenheim into a deserved 2-1 half-time lead. Both Hoffenheim and Leipzig entered this match in scintillating form, with Christian Ilzer's side enjoying three successive wins while the visitors were eight games unbeaten in the Bundesliga - nine in all competitions.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim vs. RB Leipzig preview: Hoffenheim look for second home win against in-form Leipzig
arts.sum: Hoffenheim are searching for their second home win of the season as they welcome RB Leipzig to Sinsheim.
